titles.title: GSP Update for Production Diversification and Trade Enhancement Act
A bill to make certain luggage and travel articles eligible for duty-free treatment under the Generalized System of Preferences, and for other purposes.
GSP UPDATE Act
GSP Update for Production Diversification and Trade Enhancement Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
GSP Update for Production Diversification and Trade Enhancement Act or the GSP UPDATE Act
Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to authorize the President to designate certain luggage and travel articles as eligible for duty-free treatment under the Generalized System of Preferences (GSP).
